summary: Orlando Letelier was the victim of an assassination, which prompted investigations into potential connections to various groups. These groups include Cuban exiles, Venezuelan secret police, the CIA, and Chilean secret police. Documents suggest investigations focused on the organization of CORU in relation to Letelier's death. The assassination also led to scrutiny of individuals like Orlando Bosch Avila and his alleged contact with the Novo brothers shortly before Letelier's death. The investigations involved reporters traveling to Caracas to explore these connections.
significance: While the documents provided do not directly link Orlando Letelier to the JFK assassination, they highlight investigations into his assassination and potential connections to various organizations and individuals, some of whom may have been of interest in other contexts.
